title: Future vs Former World Champion | Kasparov faces Tigran Petrosian
description:
#agadmator Kasparov and Petrosian played 5 games altogether. The result after these 5 games is: 2 wins Kasparov, 2 wins Petrosian and 1 draw.
Kasparov had the white pieces in all 5 games :)

Garry Kasparov vs Tigran Vartanovich Petrosian
Moscow (1981), Moscow URS, rd 8, Apr-14 
Queen's Indian Defense: Kasparov-Petrosian Variation. Petrosian Attack (E12)

1. d4 Nf6 2. c4 e6 3. Nf3 b6 4. a3 Bb7 5. Nc3 d5 6. cd5 Nd5 7. e3 Be7 8. Bb5 c6 9. Bd3 Nc3 10. bc3 c5 11. O-O O-O 12. Qc2 g6 13. e4 Nc6 14. Bh6 Re8 15. Rfd1 Qc7 16. Qe2 Red8 17. Qe3 e5 18. d5 Na5 19. c4 Nb3 20. Ra2 f6 21. h4 Bc8 22. Rb1 Nd4 23. Nd4 cd4 24. Qg3 Bf8 25. Bd2 Bd6 26. Rf1 Qg7 27. a4 a5 28. Rb2 Bc5 29. f4 Bd7 30. h5 Ba4 31. h6 Qc7 32. f5 g5 33. Bg5 fg5 34. Qg5 Kf8 35. Qf6 Ke8 36. Ra1 Qe7 37. Qe6 Rd6 38. Qg8 Qf8 39. Qg3 Qh6 40. Ra4 Qc1 41. Kf2 Qb2
